resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

One of the two regulation styles:
(a) Polyester/wool, navy mid length skirt.
(b) Polyester/wool, navy full length skirt.
Regulation polyester/wool, navy dress trousers. Fitted and non-fitted available.
Regulation navy jersey with school crest.
Regulation red jersey with school crest.
Regulation MRGS open-necked shirt with coloured school logo on pocket; long or short-sleeved (navy collar). Fitted and non-fitted available.
Regulation MRGS open-necked shirt with grey school logo on pocket; long or short-sleeved (grey collar). Fitted and non-fitted available.
Must not be visible at the neck or beneath school shirt. No longsleeved garment may be worn under a short-sleeved shirt

Black leather, flat-heeled, full-foot (for reasons of safety), school shoes with backs. High heeled, canvas, suede leather, high-soled (platform), ballet-type, backless shoes, boots, sandals, scuffs, jandals, slippers, track shoes or casual street brand shoes such as Nike, Chuck Taylors or Vans may NOT be worn.
MRGS regulation knee high socks, short black socks, or black tights. No logos or brandings.
Regulation MRGS jacket. Only the regulation MRGS jacket may be worn.
Regulation MRGS navy blazer with school crest

string.name: contactinstruction
string.i: This information will be public for interested buyers to contact you regarding this listing
